page.title: 03A Dairy Farming Unit.
page.content: We called in at{Compton Road Farm.}We went into the storage room. Mr. Pierce has{150 acres of land.}The metal tank inside the storage room holds 7,000 litres of milk.His only crop is grass. {He said he had 7 fields and 130 cows that are{Friesian}and{Hereford.}He grows his own feed which is silage. Artificial Insemination is used to make the cows pregnant. This method uses only the best pedigree bulls. A cow needs 1\ tons of silage per month.A cow eats silage for 7 months and grass for 5 months.The farmer makes 12,000 tons of silage per year.} The cows come indoors from October_ April.{The average yield of milk per {year is 5,000 litres.}Mr.Pierce enjoys farming. { { { }
